review: I was really excited to get this. Pretty much all the apps I use work pretty well except for MLB.TV. I bought this so that I can watch my baseball on my tv as I got rid of my cable. The buffering while using MLB.TV is aweful! No matter what I do nothing has fixed this and my bandwidth always comes in no less than 3x what is needed....Until Amazon can fix the problem, this product will only get 3 stars....
author: Joseph
